ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(LEN(BillingCity) =0,NOT(OR($Profile.Name = 'GES Interface',$Profile.Name = 'SOP Interface',$Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name ='EEPriorityLeadGen', $User.Update_Locked_Account_Fields__c,$Profile.Name = 'EDAdmin_Interface',$Profile.Name = "GES Administrator Interface", $Profile.Name = 'EMEA Spiro Interface', $Profile.Name = 'EMEA System Administrator')))
